data_table.description: Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived Form, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Subject ID [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]

variable.name: AAT4
variable.description: Aorta scan result Rdr [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]

variable.name: AAO2A
variable.description: Q2a. Enter diameters with correct values. Proximal aorta AP (cm) [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]

variable.name: AAO2B
variable.description: Q2b. Enter diameters with correct values. Proximal aorta transverse (cm) [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]

variable.name: AAO2C
variable.description: Q2c. Enter diameters with correct values. Mid aorta AP (cm) [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]

variable.name: AAO2D
variable.description: Q2d. Enter diameters with correct values. Mid aorta transverse (cm) [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]

variable.name: AAO2E
variable.description: Q2e. Enter diameters with correct values. Distal aorta AP (cm) [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]

variable.name: AAO2F
variable.description: Q2f. Enter diameters with correct values. Distal aorta transverse (cm) [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]

variable.name: AAO2G
variable.description: Q2g. Enter diameters with correct values. Fusiform aneurysm diameter AP (cm) [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]

variable.name: AAO2H
variable.description: Q2h. Enter diameters with correct values. Fusiform aneurysm diameter transverse (cm) [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]

variable.name: AAO3A
variable.description: Q3a. Other potential abnormalities. Saccular aneurysm AP (cm) [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]

variable.name: AAO3B
variable.description: Q3b. Other potential abnormalities. Saccular aneurysm transverse (cm) [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]

variable.name: AAO4A
variable.description: Q4a. Check all of the following that apply. Alert Result: AAA>=5 cm [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]

variable.name: AAO4A1
variable.description: Q4a1. Abdominal aorta aneurysm alert location and size or [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]

variable.name: AAO4B
variable.description: Q4b. Check all of the following that apply. Alert Result: other abnormality [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]

variable.name: AAO4B1
variable.description: Q4b1. Description of other alert abnormality or [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]

variable.name: AAO4C
variable.description: Q4c. Check all of the following that apply. Abnormal Result: AAA 3-4.9 cm [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]

variable.name: AAO4C1
variable.description: Q4c1. Check all of the following that apply. AAA abnormal location and size [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]

variable.name: AAO4D
variable.description: Q4d. Check all of the following that apply. Abnormal Result: saccular aneurysm [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]

variable.name: AAO4D1
variable.description: Q4d1. Saccular aneurysm abnormal result location or [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]

variable.name: AAO4E
variable.description: Q4e. Check all of the following that apply. Abnormal Result: other clinically relevant abnormality [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]

variable.name: AAO4E1
variable.description: Q4e1. Check all of the following that apply. Abnormal Result: description of other clinically relevant abnormality [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]

variable.name: AAO4F
variable.description: Q4f. Check all of the following that apply. Normal aorta results [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]

variable.name: AAO4G
variable.description: Q4g. Check all of the following that apply. Prior intervention. Evidence of aortic aneurysmal surgery Or [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]

variable.name: AAO4H
variable.description: Q4h. Check all of the following that apply. Prior intervention. Evidence of aortic stent/angioplasty [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]

variable.name: AAA_SAMPLE
variable.description: 1=Selected to random normal sample, 2= Extra over-read, 0=Not selected to random normal sample [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]
variable.value: Not selected to random normal sample

variable.name: AAA
variable.description: 1=Presence of abdominal aorta aneurysm, 0=No presence Of abdominal aorta aneurysm [Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm - Derived, AAA_DERV]
variable.value: No presence Of abdominal aorta aneurysm
